actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to make section 208 (acts affecting a personal financial interest) and section 209 (salary of Government officials and employees payable only by United States) applicable to the President and Vice President of the United States.

summary.text: Extends to the President and Vice President of the United States the provisions of Federal law prohibiting Federal employes from participating in acts affecting a personal financial interest and from receiving compensation for services in his on her official capacity from sources other than the United States Government.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to make section 208 (acts affecting a personal financial interest) and section 209 (salary of Government officials and employees payable only by United States) applicable to the President and Vice President of the United States.
